meanings.definition: Made or shaped by carving or molding
meanings.sent1: The sculptured statue looked beautiful in the park.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed a sculptured vase at the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The sculptured cake was almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her sculptured hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The sculptured clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.definition: Having a three-dimensional form or appearance
meanings.sent1: The sculptured mountain stood majestically against the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The room was adorned with sculptured decorations on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The sculptured toy seemed to come to life in the child's hands.
meanings.sent4: Her sculptured face showed a range of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The sculptured tree cast a shadow on the ground in the afternoon sun.

meanings.definition: To create or represent in a sculptural form
meanings.sent1: She sculptured a beautiful figure out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculptured a masterpiece out of marble.
meanings.sent3: He sculptured a funny caricature of his friend out of playdough.
meanings.sent4: The sculptured details on the building's facade were intricate.
meanings.sent5: They sculptured a scene from the story out of sand on the beach.
